meanings.definition: The quality or characteristic of being sexually attracted to people of the same sex.
meanings.sent1: Homosexuality is when someone is attracted to people of the same sex.
meanings.sent2: Her homosexuality was something she embraced and celebrated.
meanings.sent3: At the party, his homosexuality was the topic of many jokes.
meanings.sent4: In a world where diversity is celebrated, his homosexuality shone brightly.
meanings.sent5: The film portrayed the struggles and joys of homosexuality with honesty.

meanings.definition: The state of being homosexual; sexual attraction or behavior between members of the same sex.
meanings.sent1: Understanding homosexuality is important for creating an inclusive society.
meanings.sent2: Their love story was a beautiful example of homosexuality.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show humorously explored the quirks of homosexuality.
meanings.sent4: In the play, the characters' homosexuality was a symbol of freedom.
meanings.sent5: The book delved into the complexities of homosexuality in a touching way.
